channel.title: Border Crossing on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Border Crossing on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: BC-99 South - Border Crossing Times
item.description: Vancouver area border crossing times into the USA on BC-99 south. Border crossing times via Peace Arch (BC-99), Pacific X-ING (BC-15), Aldergrove (BC-13), and Sumas (BC-11).

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 275
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 275 - WA-543 North/Border Crossing. WA-543 crosses the Canadian border at the Pacific Highway border crossing, which is the border crossing for commercial vehicles. Non-commercial vehicles may cross at Pacific Highway as well.

item.title: I-5 North - Border Crossing Map
item.description: Border Crossing map on I-5 north approaching WA-543.

item.title: I-5 North - Border Crossing Hours
item.description: I-5/WA-543 Border Crossing Hours on I-5 north. Both I-5 (Peace Arch) and WA-543 (Pacific Highway) crossings are open 24 Hours.

item.title: I-5 North - Border Wait Times
item.description: Border Wait Times on I-5 North. Both I-5 (Peace Arch) and WA-543 (Pacific Highway) crossing are less than 5 minutes in this photo. This was taken at 7 AM on a Saturday. As it happened there was only one car in front of me at Canada Customs.

item.title: I-8 East Approaching CA-7 - Port of Entry Hours
item.description: I-8 east approaching CA-7 - Border Crossing Hours. Port of Entry Closed from 12AM to 6AM.

item.title: BL-19 South at I-19 and Border Crossing
item.description: BL-19 south at I-19 north to Tucson. Continue on BL-19 south for the border crossing into Mexico. This is the beginning of I-19.

item.title: I-19 at Crawford St. - Border Crossing Station
item.description: I-19 at Crawford St. Turn left on Crawford St. for the Border Crossing Station. There is a bilingual warning about bringing firearms and ammunition into Mexico.

item.title: End CA-111 South at International Border
item.description: End CA-111 at the International Boundary. Mexicali is just past the border post.

item.title: I-8 West Exit 166
item.description: I-8 west approaching Exit 166, CA-186/Algodones Road/Andrade. Border crossing with Mexico closed 10p - 6a.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching Canadian Border - Laurier
item.description: US-395 North approaching the United States - Canada Border. The United States side is Port of Laurier; the Canadian side is Port of Cascade.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching United States - Canada Border
item.description: US-395 North approaching the United States - Canada Border. The United States side is Port of Laurier; the Canadian side is Port of Cascade.

item.title: ID-1 South - USA-Canada Border
item.description: Welcome To The United States/US Customs, ID-1 South. This is taken right at the border gate. The post on the right side of the picture is what the border gate is attached to.

item.title: ID-1 South - Welcome To USA and Idaho
item.description: Welcome To the United States of America and Welcome TO Idaho on ID-1 South

item.title: Kingsport, BC Customs Station
item.description: Customs Canada at End of US-95 North

item.title: US-Canada Border - Eastport, ID/Kingsgate, BC
item.description: The international bounday between United States and Canada at the Easport,ID/Kingsgate, BC border crossing. The picture is taken right on the international boundary. You can see a swath of trees cut down at the border itself, and you can see that same swath as a notch at the top of the ridge in the background. United States is to the left - Canada to the right.
